title: Google\Cloud\Kms\V1\Certificate
name: Certificate
description:
A [Certificate][google.cloud.kms.v1.Certificate] represents an X.509 certificate used to authenticate HTTPS connections to EKM replicas.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.kms.v1.Certificate

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.raw_der
params.description: Required. The raw certificate bytes in DER format.

params.name: data.parsed
params.description: Output only. True if the certificate was parsed successfully.

params.name: data.issuer
params.description: Output only. The issuer distinguished name in RFC 2253 format. Only present if [parsed][google.cloud.kms.v1.Certificate.parsed] is true.

params.name: data.subject
params.description: Output only. The subject distinguished name in RFC 2253 format. Only present if [parsed][google.cloud.kms.v1.Certificate.parsed] is true.

params.name: data.subject_alternative_dns_names
params.description: Output only. The subject Alternative DNS names. Only present if [parsed][google.cloud.kms.v1.Certificate.parsed] is true.

params.name: data.not_before_time
params.description: Output only. The certificate is not valid before this time. Only present if [parsed][google.cloud.kms.v1.Certificate.parsed] is true.

params.name: data.not_after_time
params.description: Output only. The certificate is not valid after this time. Only present if [parsed][google.cloud.kms.v1.Certificate.parsed] is true.

params.name: data.serial_number
params.description: Output only. The certificate serial number as a hex string. Only present if [parsed][google.cloud.kms.v1.Certificate.parsed] is true.

params.name: data.sha256_fingerprint
params.description: Output only. The SHA-256 certificate fingerprint as a hex string. Only present if [parsed][google.cloud.kms.v1.Certificate.parsed] is true.
